resources.string: Please select the location where the password file is to be found.
The format of the file is invalid.
There are no files in the Revelandion subdirectory. Please copy the revelantion password files into that subdirectory in order to open them here.
The given parameters are invalid. Please check them and try again.
The given password is invalid. Please enter a valid password.
The chosen file is invalid. Please choose a valid file.
The external storage medium is not mounted, please insert the external card and retry.
The requested file was not found. Please do not remove the card while opening the file.
The file could not be opened for unknown reasons.
The Revelandroid subdirectory could not be created in the external storage.
No files were found in the Dropbox "Revelation" subdirectory. Please copy the revelation files there and try again.
Timeout when waiting for the list of files in the Revelation subdirectory.
Select a file from the list, type the password and click open.
